installCommand: if [ -f next.config.ts ] && [ -d app ]; then npm install --legacy-peer-deps --include=dev; else cd quiz-interface/apps/admin && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --include=dev; fi
buildCommand: if [ -f next.config.ts ] && [ -d app ]; then rm -rf .next && npm run build; else cd quiz-interface/apps/admin && rm -rf .next && npm run build; fi
